short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Translator extension companion to Helen Reader flash-cards app on iOS.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Reading the original is not difficult at all if you know key words.

With “Helen Reader Translator”, the translation is instantaneous, without distracting you from what is happening. And any unfamiliar words are saved for practice in vocabularies keeping the context from a page.

Download the extension and start reading!
